Post-Match Reflections: Nikola Jokić expressed that outside of Michael Porter Jr. and Jamal Murray, the team is not replete with great shooters.
Nikola Jokić had a strong day, scoring 16 points on 6-of-13 shooting while also adding 13 rebounds and 12 assists.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Denver Nuggets fell 102-87 to the Oklahoma City Thunder in their season opener on Thursday.
Shooting was a major issue for the Nuggets, going 35-of-98 from the field and just 7-of-38 from three-point range.
